description:
The glance client allows disabling ssl_compression. 
The option to do this should be added to nova as it can provide a performance boost.
title: Nova should disable glance's ssl_compression feature

comments.content:
The glance client allows disabling ssl_compression. 
The option to do this should be added to nova as it can provide a performance boost.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~stuart-mclaren

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/32562
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/32562
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/583addcac70fdb02c8101c8aeeb1949f39be2225
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 583addcac70fdb02c8101c8aeeb1949f39be2225
Author: Stuart McLaren <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jun 11 12:40:42 2013 +0000

    Disable ssl layer compression for glance requests.
    
    This may improve data throughput, eg when high network bandwidth is
    available and you are using already compressed image formats such as
    qcow2 .
    
    Addresses bug 1189887.
    
    Change-Id: Iacc42d8e0cab218258c3029d5395e02fddb75197
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
